title: (x) NY Mag condensed sans w/ rounded corners - Elderkin {Angel}
content:
Does anyone know what font this is? You can see another example of it at [http://nymag.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100307011109/http:/nymag.com/ "http://nymag.com/"). Ultramagnetic and Brauer come close... but not close enough.

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100307011109im_/http:/typophile.com/files/type2_6146.jpg)
author: ian00

comments.content:
Eric Olsonâ€™s Elderkin. No longer available...

[http://typophile.com/node/12398](http://web.archive.org/web/20100307011109/http:/typophile.com/node/12398 "http://typophile.com/node/12398")
Thanks Angel. It's a shame that Mr. Olson pulled it - it's rather lovely.
